intro_only_event_pasiosalon_tutorial/690:
There’s a place I’d like to show you
and Rosa.
Wow! What a pretty place! What’s it for?
This place is called the Trainer Lodge!

It’s a space we set up so Trainers can freely
interact and have fun together.
What made you decide to set this place up?
Trainers come to Pasio from all sorts of places...

We thought it would be helpful for team members
and others that don’t know each other too well to
grow closer and become friends!

So we hope you can build some friendships
with a lot of different Trainers here
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Let’s work on deepening our own friendship
right now!
